data.title: MaRy J Blige
data.meta_description: MaRy J Blige - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. MaRY J . BliGe Legacy 2 Leadership Presented by : Nytrice McGhee

2. MaRY J BliGe Many may know Mary J Blige as a talented individual that takes on many occupations . Song writer Singer Rapper Actress Model Record Producer

3. Early Years Mary was born January 11,1971 to the parents Cora and Thomas Blige Her mother Cora was a nurse Her farther Thomas was a jazz musician Mary spent her early years in Savannah, Georgia, where she sang in a Pentecostal church. At the age of five, she was sexually abused by a family friend.

4. Adolescence She dropped out of school in eleventh grade At the age of 17, Mary recorded an impromptu cover of Anita Bakers "Caught Up In the Rapture" at a recording booth in the Galleria Mall in White Plains, New York. In 1989 Mary J Blige was signed to the label of Uptown Records Becoming the company's youngest and first female artist

5. Adulthood Blige had a very public and tumultuous six-year relationship with Jodeci frontman In 2000, Blige began a relationship with record industry executive Martin Kendu Isaacs who is now her manager. During her relationships she had an addiction to drugs and alcohol On March 27, 2008 it was reported that Mary J. Blige, along with her husband bought a 12.3 million dollar house, with a movie theater and a basketball court

6. Contributions Mary J. Blige opened a Center For Women! She opened the center because of her difficult and abusive childhood inspired her to lend a hand to other women. In 2008, Mary J. started the Foundation for the Advancement of Women . as a way to support women with educational programs, career development, self-esteem and personal growth.

7. Interesting fact I have learned A leader by its meaning is one who goes first and leads, so that others are motivated to follow. This is a basic requirement. To be a leader, a person must have a deep-rooted commitment to the goal that he will strive to achieve it even if nobody follows him!
